item.description:
This is our November meetup. For those of you in the industry, it's the day after MITX.

Agenda:
6:00pm Pizza and Networking

6:30pm Marketing Demonstration:
----- Sitecore will demonstrate the newly released Sitecore 6.2, concentrating on the new functionality: Word Fields, RSS, WebDAV Drag-n-Drop media

7:00pm Technical Demonstration:
-----Mark Stiles from Oasis Technology Partners will be demonstrating a customization that integrates Brightcove video hosting into the Sitecore Media Library.

7:30pm Developer Network Feedback:
----Sitecore is soliciting feedback on their SDN portal. What do you like? What would you like to see?

7:45pm Discussion about the User Group and Future Schedule

8-8:30pm Networking and Cleanup

8:30pm Adjurn to a Cambridge Pub
item.name: Sitecore User Group November Meetup
